summary: NHTSA# 99-I-006-000: THIS IS NOT A SAFETY  RECALL IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE SAFETY ACT.    HOWEVER, IT IS DEEMED A SAFETY IMPROVEMENT CAMPAIGN BY THE AGENCY.  VEHICLE DESCRIPTION:  CERTAIN LIGHT DUTY PICKUP TRUCKS, SPORT UTILITY VEHICLES, OR MINIVANS EQUIPPED WITH 3-SENSOR ABS (ANTI-LOCK BRAKING SYSTEM) EBC4 UNITS. THE CONSUMER'S VEHICLE EXPERIENCED THE SAME FAILURE, HOWEVER  THE VEHICLE IDENTIFICATION NUMBER WAS NOT INCLUDED.    *JB
